text:
Question 178) The largest pool in the world, recorded in the book Guinness, is located in Chile, in San Alfonso del Mar, covering a land of 8 hectares of area. 1 hectare is known to correspond to 1 square hectometer.
What is the value, in square meters, of the area covered by the pool ground?
A) 8
B) 80
C) 800
D) 8 000
E) 80 000
